response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the pork chop in the oven without any execution error. Now, we need to turn on the oven to heat the pork chop.
response.subtask:
(1) Put the pork chop in the oven
(2) Turn on the oven to heat the pork chop
(3) Wait for the pork chop to be cooked
(4) Take the heated pork chop out of the oven
(5) Put the heated pork chop on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 2: Turn on the oven to heat the pork chop
    oven = registry(env,"oven_wuinhm_0")
    toggle_on(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
